data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Siler, Cameron D., Linkem, Charles W., Cobb, Kerry, Watters, Jessa L., Cummings, Sean T., Diesmos, Arvin C., Brown, Rafe M. (2014): Taxonomic revision of the semi-aquatic skink Parvoscincus leucospilos (Reptilia: Squamata: Scincidae), with description of three new species. Zootaxa 3847 (3): 388-412, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3847.3.4
